QueryResult.text: select u.unit_id, unit_mode, r.user_id, r.id resource_id from srm_resources r, prj_obs_associations oa, prj_obs_units ou, prj_obs_types ot, obs_units_flat_by_mode u where u.linked_unit_id = oa.unit_id and table_name = 'SRM_RESOURCES' and oa.record_id = r.id and r.user_id is not null and oa.unit_id = ou.id and ou.type_id = ot.id and ot.is_security = 1
